snippet.title: Gray Zone Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Gray Zone is available to purchase now on Steam's Early Access: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1207320/Gray_Zone/ 

Gray Zone is a narrative driven tactical RTS shoot ‘em up with RPG elements. It's an odyssey of a slave who turned against his masters, set in our galaxy hundreds of years from now. Expect memorable characters, fun dialogs and lots of action! For PC Windows 10 by EastWorks Studios.

As a former slave your must reunite your nation, fight back against those that oppressed you! Know when to use brawn and when to use your brains, do you have what it takes? 

Visit our official channels for more information: 

Website: https://grayzonegame.com/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/grayzonegame/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GRAYZONE6
